description:
Solve the **Walls and Gates** problem.

You are given an m x n grid initialized with three possible values: -1 (wall or obstacle), 0 (gate), INF (2147483647, empty room). Fill each empty room with the distance to its nearest gate. If it is impossible to reach a gate, leave it as INF. The operation is in-place.

See the full problem description on [LeetCode](https://leetcode.com/problems/walls-and-gates/).

examples.explanation: BFS from all gates simultaneously fills rooms with minimum distances.
Only a wall, no rooms to fill.
